name: Niche Self Employed Mortgage Calculator
author: Niche Mortgage Info (https://nichemortgageinfo.co.uk)

sections.description:
Self Employed Mortgage Calculator works out an estimate of how much can be borrowed when getting a mortgage. The overall available income is multiplied by 4.5. There is an option for Soletrader, Partnership, Director & Contractor.

In this current version, you can change the colour scheme in the admin.

Watch the Plugin Demo here

Customise

Goto Settings > Niche FTB Calculator
Select color scheme
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Please find more details on Plugin Installation in documentation
  4. Set Up Page in Menu -> Calculator Builder.
